response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset for you as well. Given its worth to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $12,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between the product's intrinsic value and your perceived worth, while also ensuring a satisfactory return for me. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this beneficial exchange.", "product_price": 12000}
